# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="b1c39-102">방법: 자동으로 생성된 열을 Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤에서 제거</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1c39-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b1c39-103">데이터 원본의 데이터를 기반으로 열을 자동으로 생성 하도록 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 컨트롤을 설정한 경우 특정 열을 선택적으로 생략할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1c39-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b1c39-104"><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> 컬렉션에 대해 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> 메서드를 호출 하 여이 작업을 수행할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1c39-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b1c39-105">또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> 속성을 `false`설정 하 여 뷰에서 열을 숨길 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1c39-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b1c39-106">이 기법은 특정 조건에 숨겨진 열을 표시 하거나 열을 표시 하지 않고 열에 있는 데이터에 액세스 해야 하는 경우에 유용 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1c39-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="b1c39-107">자동 생성 열을 제거 하려면</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1c39-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b1c39-108"><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> 컬렉션에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> 메서드를 호출 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1c39-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="b1c39-109">자동 생성 열을 숨기려면</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1c39-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b1c39-110">열의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> 속성을 `false`로 설정 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1c39-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b1c39-112">코드 컴파일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1c39-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="b1c39-113">이 예제에는 다음 사항이 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1c39-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b1c39-114">Northwind 샘플 데이터베이스의 `Customers` 테이블과 같이 `Fax` 및 `CustomerID` 열을 포함 하는 테이블에 바인딩된 `dataGridView1` 이라는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 컨트롤입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1c39-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b1c39-115"><xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> 어셈블리에 대한 참조</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1c39-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
